name: The Mirrored Path
description:
Mariam and her little brother, Karim explore an abandoned Egyptian Temple. Little did they know,the pyramid was full of mysteries and hidden secrets. But even before they could unveil the mysteries…the most unexpected happened! Karim breaks a mirror and gets sucked into the walls of the Temple. Amun Ra has put a curse. Unless Mariam restores the temple's light within ten days she will lose her brother forever.

Solve mirror puzzles in the real world and gain access as a hieroglyphic within the tomb walls. Combat and steer free from enemies and obstacles and collect orbs of light to break the curse back in the real world.

Unleash yourself in the world of pyramids and hieroglyphics to guide you along the journey! Find the lost light and calm down the God of Light! 

Come PLAY “THE MIRRORED PATH”
